subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project aims to develop a model for making food available and accessible in a sustainable manner in poor households at the community level. By promoting the planting of carbohydrate-rich root and tuber crops, vitamin- and mineral- rich native vegetables and growing protein-rich native chicken in home gardens, the project will link production in home gardens to consumption at the household kitchen. It will also link production in school gardens to consumption in feeding programs of schools and day care centers.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Sapat at Masustansyang Pagkain

title: SAPAT:  Developing Model to Expand National Food Base
